title: 【OOC】原版急冻拳MOD1.8
author: 新之助~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 新之助~ 于 2016-12-17 20:23 编辑 

======================================================================

原版急冻拳MOD

======================================================================

视频介绍

======================================================================

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNjczOTY5Njc2.html

======================================================================

帖子介绍

======================================================================

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=241005&extra=page%3D27%26filter%3Dtypeid%26typeid%3D1293复制代码

======================================================================

制作原因

======================================================================

我觉得不错所以做成了OOC
并不是100%抄袭
有一点不同

======================================================================


OOC内容

======================================================================


当你用手和手上的东西打怪物时
怪物会给冻着
当然在他旁边的也会

======================================================================

原理

======================================================================


第一条
/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt
创建计分板（怪物被打就有1积分）
第二条
/gamerule commandBlockOutput false
关闭提示
第三条
/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[r=6,type=!Player] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~2 ~1 ice 0 hollow

在你有1积分 在附近6格的生物生存冰块
第四条
/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @p[score_damage_min=1] damage 0
吧积分为1的人的积分设置为0



======================================================================

OOC指令

======================================================================

/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-21 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-13 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-13 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-11 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-10 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-9 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-8 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-7 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @p[score_damage_min=1] damage 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[r=6,type=!Player] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~2 ~1 ice 0 hollow"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-5 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"~作者大大~\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False}",Text2:"{text:\\"新之助~\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:True,strikethrough:False}",Text3:"{text:\\"原版急冻拳MOD\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False}",Text4:""}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-2 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~0 ~5 ~4 ~0 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @p {text:" 欢迎使用原版急冻拳MOD"} "},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~25 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码

======================================================================

replies.author: 新之助~
星E君
replies.txt_content: 居然能把我两年前的帖子挖出来，真佩服你233333

replies.author: skeleton小白
replies.txt_content: 建议使用HurtTime标签锁定被攻击的生物，否则一打冻一大片

replies.author: 星空w
replies.txt_content:
skeleton小白 发表于 2016-10-23 03:42
建议使用HurtTime标签锁定被攻击的生物，否则一打冻一大片
然而他这个应该是r=6的锅XD

replies.author: 新之助~
replies.txt_content:
quangegegege 发表于 2016-10-23 08:37

没错.......
